QuestData.Title: Obsidian Oathstone
QuestData.Description:
When Neltharion became the Earth-Warder, he swore an oath to protect this world, $n. To safeguard the deep places of the earth and, with his flight, to serve as Azeroth's defenders. The Obsidian Oathstone represents that promise.
We must activate the stone and let the Dragon Isles know that the black dragonflight has returned!
Follow me, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: This is a setback, but with your help, I am sure we can repair the Oathstone. Work with Bazentus... make it so.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Wrathion at the Oathstone
